name: JB Hunter: Adventure
description:
This game will immerse you in a wonderful stylized beach somewhere in the outskirts of the hot countries of our Planet.
A pleasant anime atmosphere, light drinks, beautiful girls and yellow sand - that's what awaits our character, changing day and night!

During the day you are left to your own devices, on a crowded beach with gorgeous girls.
Foam parties await you at night.

Your phone has a social network in which you maintain your blog dedicated to your adventures among beautiful girls. Subscribers to your blog will send tasks, the completion of which will increase your blog.
Take pictures of girls and surroundings with your phone - just shoot of whatever you want, or specific places, maybe pretty girls!
Post pictures on your blog and get new likes them... More good pictures - more blog activity!

Communicate with girls - talk to the girls and try to win them over by resorting to deception or try to tell them the real story about yourself.
But be careful - because you as a guy, are not a welcome guest on this beach, which it's only for girls!

As you stay on the beach, and as visitors become dissatisfied with your stay, you run the risk of finding yourself in a situation where everyone will try to kick you out of this place.
Lifeguards will come to the aid of beach girls, who will throw you out of this place without any caresses.

If you are tired of shooting photos and communication, there are always got a mini games at your disposal that, you can immerse yourself in on this beach ... play the piano, control cars (remote control), draw on the board and so...

Good luck and good weather!
